languages.text: "Последний раз тайну реликвии пытался разгадать один из ваших предшественников. Это было давно, еще до рождения Леди Теодоры — вот и все, что мне известно".
"One of your predecessors was the last to attempt solving this relic's mystery. It happened a long time ago, before Lady Theodora was born. That's all I know."
languages.original_text: "Последний раз тайну реликвии пытался разгадать один из ваших предшественников. Это было давно, еще до рождения Леди Теодоры — вот и все, что мне известно".

traits.locale_text: "One of your predecessors was the last to attempt solving this relic's mystery. It was a long time ago, before Lady Theodora was born. That's all I know."
"One of your predecessors was the last to attempt solving this relic's mystery. It was a long time ago, before Lady Theodora was born. That's all I know."
"One of your predecessors was the last to attempt solving this relic's mystery. It happened a long time ago, before Lady Theodora was born. That's all I know."
"One of your predecessors was the last to attempt solving this relic's mystery. It happened a long time ago, before Lady Theodora was born. That's all I know."
"One of your predecessors was the last to attempt solving this relic's mystery. It happened a long time ago, before Lady Theodora was born. That's all I know."
"One of your predecessors was the last to attempt solving this relic's mystery. It happened a long time ago, before Lady Theodora was born. That's all I know."

languages.text: « La dernière personne à avoir tenté de résoudre le mystère de cette relique était l'un de vos prédécesseurs. C'était il y a bien longtemps, avant même la naissance de dame Théodora. C'est tout ce que je sais. »
languages.original_text: "One of your predecessors was the last to attempt solving this relic's mystery. It happened a long time ago, before Lady Theodora was born. That's all I know."

traits.locale_text: « La dernière personne à avoir tenté de résoudre le mystère de cette relique était l'un de vos prédécesseurs. C'était il y a bien longtemps, avant même la naissance de dame Théodora. C'est tout ce que je sais. »

languages.text: «La última persona que intentó resolver el misterio de esta reliquia fue uno de sus predecesores. De eso hace ya mucho tiempo, antes incluso de que naciese lady Theodora. Es todo cuanto sé».
languages.original_text: "One of your predecessors was the last to attempt solving this relic's mystery. It happened a long time ago, before Lady Theodora was born. That's all I know."

traits.locale_text: «La última persona que intentó resolver el misterio de esta reliquia fue uno de sus predecesores. De eso hace ya mucho tiempo, antes incluso de que naciese lady Theodora. Es todo cuanto sé».

languages.text: “最后一位试图解开圣物之谜的人，是您的某位前任行商浪人。那已经是很久以前的事情了，早在西奥多拉夫人诞生之前。我知道的事情只有这些。”
languages.original_text: "One of your predecessors was the last to attempt solving this relic's mystery. It happened a long time ago, before Lady Theodora was born. That's all I know."

traits.locale_text: “最后一位试图解开圣物之谜的人，是您的某位前任行商浪人。那已经是很久以前的事情了，早在西奥多拉夫人诞生之前。我知道的事情只有这些。”

languages.text: 「この遺物の謎を解こうとしたのは、あなたの先代の一人が最後でした。それは、シオドーラ様がお生まれになる前のことです。私が知っているのはそれだけです」
languages.original_text: "One of your predecessors was the last to attempt solving this relic's mystery. It happened a long time ago, before Lady Theodora was born. That's all I know."

traits.locale_text: 「この遺物の謎を解こうとしたのは、あなたの先代の一人が最後でした。それは、シオドーラ様がお生まれになる前のことです。私が知っているのはそれだけです」

languages.text: "Einer Eurer Vorgänger hat als Letztes Versucht, das Geheimnis dieses Relikts zu ergründen. Lange vor Lady Theodoras Geburt. Mehr weiß ich nicht."
languages.original_text: "One of your predecessors was the last to attempt solving this relic's mystery. It happened a long time ago, before Lady Theodora was born. That's all I know."

traits.locale_text: "Einer Eurer Vorgänger hat als Letztes Versucht, das Geheimnis dieses Relikts zu ergründen. Lange vor Lady Theodoras Geburt. Mehr weiß ich nicht."
"Einer Eurer Vorgänger hat als Letztes Versucht, das Geheimnis dieses Relikts zu ergründen. Lange vor Lady Theodoras Geburt. Mehr weiß ich nicht."

languages.text: "Yadigârın gizemini çözme teşebbüsünde bulunan son kişi atalarınızdan biriydi. Uzun zaman önceydi, Leydi Theodora henüz doğmamıştı. Tüm bildiğim bu."
languages.original_text: "One of your predecessors was the last to attempt solving this relic's mystery. It happened a long time ago, before Lady Theodora was born. That's all I know."
